Steve hands her a tissue from the middle console.I'm sorry, I just--this has been a really shitty day.Yes I do! Right? Thank you.This is not about attitude. It's just the facts! My life hasn't turned it out the way I expected. I don't have any of those things that gives a person points in the world.No. The lady sits next to Annie and smiles at her.Oh, hey Ted. You're in town.Really? Ok, sure. Ted smiles at her. Annie stops herself.Wait no. No. No. I don't think I do. Because answering your booty calls and having you kick me out after a night of no-strings-attached sex doesn't feel good. NO girls feel good after that and if they say they do they're LYING. But it's not your fault. Its me. It's me. Have a great life. And you can keep the plant. Annie grabs her stuff and leaves.No, I think we've covered everything. I'm really excited and thank you. Annie gathers her things.I'll see you next Monday. What time do I start?I won't be late.(smiling] Yeah. Ok.Hi, I'm here to inquire about financial aid. Her cell phone rings.I'm sorry? Annie's trying to find her phone.Thanks. It's too late, she looks at her phone. It was Lillian. No message. She doesn't call her back.Discount?Are you serious?You're kidding! If you see him, would you thank him for me and tell him that I'm crazy and I'm sorry. He'll know what you mean.Hello?Oh. Hi--What do you mean she's missing?Um, gosh I..I don't know. Um, I'll come to you guys. I'll be there in an hour and 45 minutes. I wanna help. Annie hangs up, grabs her keys. She stops, comes back and grabs a small paper bag, and runs out the door.Oh my God! I think I know where she is.We're almost there.Guys it's just a flat. I've gotten tons of them. Annie goes to get out of the car.Guys! We're fine. Helen, put the hazards on. Megan hands it to her. Annie starts to unscrew the lug nuts handing them to Megan, with Leslie by her side. Dana and Becca stand with Helen.I'm removing the lug nuts so we can take the tire off.Just changing the tire.Nope I think we got it. But thank you. He doesn't leave, the girls worriedly look at each other.Almost there. The guy has lifted up his hood and Mega's looking. He puts his hands on her ass.OK, everybody in the car! Get in! Megan, Helen let's go! All the girls scramble in the car, Helen starts it. Annie is finishing.Back away! Or I will shove this Jack so far down your throat you will shit out...your fucking..face!Get out!Helen hit him over the head with a tree. They all continue talking, Helen and Annie smile.There it is, turn left up here. Go down the little hill. Ok, that's the driveway. It's dark and very rustic. It's LILLIAN'S LAKE HOUSE FROM THE FLASHBACK. Where Lillian and Dougie met.The house is right up here. They pull up to a small cottage and get out of the car.I thought she'd be here. I really thought she'd be here. I'm sorry.No, it's not. I don't know what happened. I messed everything up. Lillia's not even talking to me. I think I'm so afraid to see what's really happening. Lillian's moving on to this great life and I feel left behind. And know matter how hard I try, I don't fit in to her life now. Everyone is silent.Lillian wouldn't do that. If she asked you to be in her wedding it's because you are her friend. Trust me. Dana is crying and takes a picture. The're both startled by the flash.I'm sorry that when I left the shower I told your neighbors you were shooting a porn.Oh, well, sorry.I must say you do put on some pretty spectacular events.It is getting pretty late.She'll come home when she's ready.You okay?It's okay. I really am sorry.Well its easy to get caught up.I'm sorry. But it's all good now. We all talked and everythings cool.Yup, Helen and I are best friends now. We're going shopping for cream sweaters tomorrow.I know.It's not too late to have those things.It's fine. I just feel really lost rightOh God dont say that.You want to come in? Steve's home. This could be your last chance as a single woman.Thanks for coming with me. Megan appears on her other side.A week. I'm scared. I'm gonna be the oldest one there.Really?Oh, I want to catch this shuttle back to the hotel.I will see YOU in a couple weeks Mrs. Price!Wait! Wait! Stop! Great. Of course. The shuttle is gone, but there's something that was on the other side of it.How did you know I was here?Wow. They're looking at each other, not knowing what to do.So, did you get the moonpies?Did you like' em?Ooo, I didn't think about that.How did you know I was here?So, did you get the moonpies?Did you like' em?Ooo, I didn't think about that.

LILLIAN.raw_line: It's summer?! What the hell does that mean? He can't date anyone in the summer?No he's stupid Ann, not you.Ew. Did you have sex with him?What?!Well, at least he was honest with you so you don't waste your time with him.Can you see that I'm on the phone? I'm talking to Annie.Are you eating my Luna Bar? Those are for women you know?It's not gonna do anything to you.Ew, go take a shower. Dougie leaves.I swear I cannot handle him right now. He has been driving me crazy. Sometimes it feels like I'm kissing my brother. I don't know what do. Annie pulls into an alleyway behind HARRINGTO'S JEWELRY STORE and starts changing into her work uniform in the car. A white blouse and navy skirt.There's nothing wrong with you. But I think maybe, and don't get mad at me, I've said this to you before, you need to stop trying so hard.OK, so you had a first date last night. Did you bring him a present? Annie is silent.Ann, what did I tell you?What?!Ok, I don't know if it's because I'm tired or what, but I wanna kill him.Oh my God. We need to hang out. 'm coming to Milwaukee this weekend.We'll go to Joni's and pig out and I'll bring some shitty magazines, and I'm gonna spend the night.I'll call you tomorrow. Bye. They hang up. Dougie is in the doorway wearing her nightie stretched over his body.You're an idiot. We see she gets a kick out of him.Ann.Your boyfriend just walked in. REVEAL: An orange-skinned BODY BUILDER with HUGE arms and legs in a tiny muscle tank and shorts.Here Annie, let me turn the page for you.I just want to help you turn the page of your magazine for you...I'm engaged.He proposed at dinner last night. I wanted to tell you in person and show you this rock!I know Dougie and I have been fighting a lot, but I've been so stressed out withOh you want to get into who's done what down at the lake?Well then, who better to be my Maid of Honor?Annie, you're my best friend. Honestly I didn't even have to think about it.It's no big deal, and I don't want to make it one. It's not gonna be a big crazy thing. I wanna keep it simple. What dessert are you gonna get?Ok, but I still don't want this to be a huge production. I just want to have all my friends meet each other, have fun, dance, drink, whatever.Oh God, not yet. I don't want a super long engagement, but there's a lot to do.Can you hold that thought. I's my fiancee calling. Lillian gets up laughing. Annie laughs along with her.And now we will leave on our honeymoon to...The madness has begun. Dougie's parents are having an engagement party for us next Friday.Ann!Hey!Smoking a cigar with my dad. Le's go get a drink. They weave towards the bar.Hold on Dougie, we're getting drinks! They get to the bar and grab glasses of wine.Yeah. So does Dougie. This is the tennis club I've been playing at.Tennis courts are tennis courts if you ask me. But I have met a lot of really cool people here. I can't wait for you to meet the girls.Dougie, be careful. God, you reek! He puts her down.Ugh. Wash your face. She gives in and kisses him. Then says to Annie..Come on. Let's go say hi to the rest of the bridal party. They approach LESLIE, Lillian's cousin, late 30's, standing with her husband PAUL.Annie this is Dana, we met here in my tennis class. Dana, Annie.Dougie's partner.Ann, there you are!I'm saving you. Now I really want to introduce you to Helen. looking around) There she is. In slow motion, a tall and gorgeous HELEN turns to us. She wears a tight, cream-colored, floor-length evening gown. Annie straightens her plastic beads.Helen, this is Annie.Perry owns Atmospheria candles.You are?No, you sang. They both laugh.Ann, stop.Besides the impromptu concert from Bette Midler, it was perfect. They laugh and hug.I gotta go say bye to some people I do't know. Drive safe. Lillian goes back inside. Helen appears out of thin air.Annie, we can go somewhere else.(sotto} Wow, thanks Helen.Ann, don't worry about it. We got in. Annie sees racks of wedding dresses.Oh my God. Annie, I didn't tell you? Guess who Helen is friends with? Lady Lavonia Jean St. Petsois JuJu.That famous wedding dress designer tha's in all those wedding magazines? As a favor to Helen she's going to design my dress for almost nothing. Normally they're like twenty grand. She's French.Surprise, surprise. It's my Mom. Mom? Can you hold on a second? She covers the phone and talks to the girls.Start looking at dresses. I'll be right back. I think maybe you guys should decide anyway and pick out something you like since you're the ones wearing it. Cool? Have fun! What's up Mom? Ugh! They're booked? Lillian leaves talking to her Mom.Hey! I'm hearing lots of excitement in here. She touches Helen's dress.Oooo, I like this one. What about you guys?Cool. Let's eat! Helen dumps the dress in Annie's arms and follows Lillian.Ooh, good idea. They exit.This place is kind of amazing. I did't even know it existed.I'm sorry, I was just talking about you cause I was worried about you and--Mike from the fourth of July last year? Ooh, I've seen him Ann. He's hot.Yeah Annie, you never know.I don't know. Shoot, I can't talk now. I'm with Helen and we have a conference call with Lady Lavonia Jean St. Petsois JuJu about my dress. Ugh. I'm so sorry. She's calling! I gotta go. Have fun! Lillian hangs up. Steve walks in.Holy Shit Annie! We're goin' to Vegas!Annie, come here. Why didn't you tell me you weren't sitting with us?I'm so excited!Oh my God. You guys, is this for us?!This hotel is amazing! You guys!Oh! Okay! Then party in room 812 in one hour!Annie! I wanna see a drink in your hand in one minute! Lillian pulls Annie into the room. Helen is getting off of the phone.Thank you everybody!!Ok, Leslie spilled the beans. Le's get our asses over to Sacrifice. What are we waiting for? Wooooooo! Lillian looks at Helen's legs.Whoa whoa. Helen, turn around. Are those those Ransom Jeans?Oh my God, Annie our song! Wher's Annie?Where's Annie?!Why!?Is she okay?! Should I call her!?Annie!Are you ok?What do you mean here, where?You're where?Listen I can't hear you! We had to leave the Jungle Lounge, Becca--Meet us at the--Whoa. What are you, going to a rodeo?Yeah, why are you wearing all that makeup?What?!I was trying to find YOU. I tried to call you all night!What is going on? You told Helen you were sick.Why didn't you say something?--Annie take it easy.Guys stop! Please! Annie, I'm so sorry about last night. I feel horrible. I want to hear everything that happened. Tonight, you're not leaving my side. We're hittin' the strip club all of us and we're going to put this shit behind us. Okay?! The girls agree. Dana rubs her arm.Oooh, Ann! A siren goes off.Get her! Get her!!Only you Annie. Hands down, best moment of the weekend. Annie finally feels a part of the group.Oh look, there's your boyfriend.Oh my God. You know who that actually looks like? Remember when we went to Miami and we had to rent towels--And that lady came up to us wearing that mesh top!I'm so sorry. I was at our travel agen's trying to figure out how to get my da's family out here, they all have to fly at different times, uggh. What's that on your arms? She sees some of Annie's lice medicine motion.Oh shit, I'm sorry, I have to check one thing really quick. When is my hair consultation? Lillian frantically looks through her calender.Oh no.I knew it. I'm going to have my period on my wedding day...and my honeymoon!It's our wedding night though!I can't believe this. This sucks. Oh, Annie I wanted to ask you. Do you think for the cocktail party before the reception we should have a string trio or a horn trio?What?I know but now that I'm planning everything it's just...I wanna do it right. It's once in a life time. It's my wedding. Lillian's phone rings.Ugh! It's Dougie's Mom. She's mad at me because I won't let her invite everyone from her work. Oh! That reminds me. If you're not going to bring anybody, will you let me know? I gotta free up some spots. (into phone] Hello? Lillian walks away with the phone. Annie is speechless.Annieee!!! Lillian runs to her.Can you believe this?Coming Mom! I gotta go say hi to my aunts. She leaves and Helen appears out of nowhere again.Oh! My towels! Thank you Dana.Annie. Oh, our mugs! Thank you Annie.Wait, what's this? Lillian pulls out an envelope.Oh my God. Helen. Lillian holds up the tickets.Two first class tickets to Sea World. How did you--Annie! What is going on with you?Annie stop! I don't know what's going on.I'm sorry the the happiest time in my life has brought you so much misery. Do you know how selfish that sounds?This is my wedding and you've made it all about you.Anyone else?! Anyone else have something they wanna say to me?! Dana can't contain herself.Yeah. Didn't mean to make anyone worry.I'm sorry too. I didnt want things to turn out like this. I got so caught up in the frenzy of everything, wanting this one day to be perfect.And it doesnt help that all my friends hate eachother.She's really not so bad.I just wish the wedding hadnt become about everything and everyone else but me and Dougie. And now, it's become this thing I never wanted. I did want simple. I wanted colored lanterns, twinkly lights and food everywhere. I wanted a DJ to play all those stupid wedding songs.I'm sorry I didn't know all the stuff you were going through too. Annie is clearly sad.Nothing's going to change.I mean between you and me.Ooooo...So when does school start?So what? Now you can have an affair with your teacher and it won't be gross. They walk down the steps.Thanks for everything today. Yo've been the best Maid of Honor ever.MMM. No. That's not true at all. You were pretty terrible. Today you were good. Annie sees the hotel shuttle.You're always gonna be my best friend. They hug goodbye. She runs down the stairs.

HELEN.raw_line: Annie!?Hi.Hiiii! This is Helen. I'm one of Lillian's bridesmaids.Congratulations on being selected.Annie?Maid of Honor!!It's the number one spot. So how many times have you been in the B.P?Bridal Party?What!? I've never even heard of that.YAY! OK, I will get your e-mail from Lilly with all of the other girls' information, and when you respond to any wedding related e-mails from now on, just remember to hit âREPLY ALLâ. Did you know there are six of us?Well, can't wait to meet you and hear what your planning for the bachelorette. Any ideas?Oop! There goes my other line. See you Friday! She realizes there might some research to do for this âbridal party' thing. She instead grabs two wedding magazines.Hiii.Hiii. This is my husband Perry.All of them. It's the family business, his father started it.Perry donated a few for tonight. The room is all aflame.So how do you like our club?So you live in Milwaukee?I think I've heard of them.You're funny. Listen Annie,I know you said you've never been in a wedding before so I just want you to know that we all have, especially me, so if you need any help, don't hesitate to ask.Hello everyone. My name is Helen Harris the Third, an honored member of the bridal party. In honor of Lillian and Dougie, I'd like to take this opportunity to read a poem that I penned last summer while I was sitting on a swing at an exclusive resort in Santorini. Annie whispers to the person next to her.With every blink of an eye, every kiss of a lip, every stroke of a lovers hand, every...scent of a woman, every breath you take, every move you make. Love conquers all. Annie sees that Lillian is touched. Helen gets emotional.They say when you choose a mate, yo're choosing a best friend. Dougie, yo're a lucky man. Lillian, I know you're going to make a wonderful wife, because you have been the best friend that I could ever ask for. Annie's face goes blank.I have never had a friendship like this. I'm so happy you two are finally taking this big step together and I ca't wait for all of the adventures that await us. People are moved, sniffling. Including Lillian.Now âDouglyâ, sorry, inside joke. You better not keep my Lil on a leash. I still need my drunken nights at Rockin Sushi! TO DOUGIE AND LILLIAN!!! The crowd erupts with laughter and applause. People are crying, hugging, and standing.Thank you. Thank you! Now wher's Annie? Annie? Stand up Annie. The room looks around. Annie slowly rises.There she is. Annie is our Maid of Honor everyone. And I'm sure she'd like to take this time to say a few words. Annie? Annie stands up to the applause. The room falls silent as she walks to the podium.Annie! Great job tonight..No, nononono. Not at all. Everyone gets a little nervous and carried away during those kind of things. So listen, 've been brainstorming some theme ideas for Lillian's shower. I was thinking somewhere along the lines of Alice in Wonderland meets...are you ready? Hollywood. And for the bachelorette? Vegas.Oh, well, I hadn't heard from you and--Well, I figured since you don't have any experience that you might get overwhelmed by events of this caliber.Thank you. The guest says nothing to Annie and walks away.Annie, I didn't mean I didn't think you couldn't do it. I'm sure you are aware of all your duties. We'll see--we'll see you soon. Helen walks away. A OLD LADY passes by her.Ooh, Occasionz. I'm impressed.Listen, I know the--Whitney?Whit, it's Helen.Hiiii!Hi! Listen, I'm out here with a whole bunch of girls and we had a little miscommunication and our reservation- appointment wasn't made. Is there any way to fit us in?Ok ladies, start your engines! Shots of dresses being pulled off of the racks. Fighting for the same dress, shirts coming off, dresses zipped up the back and dresses not fitting, etc.Hi Annie!Look at your cute little boobies. Ooh, is that the dress you like?A sash? Annie, this isn't the Sound of Music tryouts.Everyone! We can't all have the dress that we want. I've been in a lot of weddings and when choosing a bridesmaid dress, you must ask yourself, âIf invited, would I wear this a dress to...The ACADEMY AWARDS!âWith that in mind, I say we wear this one. Helen holds up a dress. The girls like it.Only if they're nominated for the Sound of Music.Well, I think Lillian would like THIS one. Lillian walks in.I love it. Right guys? The girls all agree. Except Annie.I think it might look best in cream.Is that the guy who stole a bunch of money from you and gave you an STD? Everyone freezes.Lillian told me. Annie shoots Lillian a look.Well, I don't have it.Do you have anyone in mind to bring to the wedding?I know Mike too. Megan is digging a dead fly out of the butter.Oooh, I didn't know we were going to hear that word at lunch today.Annie, hi! I almost left, but they said that you were coming and that you were late. Helen is standing there looking gorgeous.I had to come into Milwaukee for a charity luncheon right down the street and I thought I'd come in and say hi.And as the leader of the bridesmaids, I thought it'd be fun to pick up some little gifts for all the girls.Well, no, sweetie, you're the Maid of Honor, and we're all bridesmaids, and out of all of us, I'm the leader. Anyway, it doesn't matter. Um, I wanted to get something that we could wear to the rehearsal dinner or something. That would be fun. Where are the diamonds?Oh! And Annie we really need to start planning the bachelorette.Can't wait.Hi.Hiiiii.I just got your e-mail. Um...Sea World?But a bachelorette at Sea World?Well, I have been talking to the other girls, and I was thinking we should go to Las Vegas! Annie's other line rings.When?Oh but it's gonna be so much fun! Besides money shouldn't be a problem if Lillian's our friend.Vegas it is.Lillian, look what's happening.I got a limo from the hotel. We're in Vegas! Yaaaay!! They all pile into the limo, excitedly talking.Come on Lillian, you're staying with me in the master suite. It's all set.Ok you guys, change of plans. The Velour Cobra had an opening at 9 so I got us a dinner reservation. Isn't that radical?Annie, don't tell Lillian, it's a surprise.My friend Sean Michael works for a promotional company and they're having this big event tonight at Tara Rei's stepbrother's Club, Sacrifice.I think it should be our first stop. H's reserving seats for us in the VIP section. It's a $150 cover and there's a one bottle champagne minimum of $750 per table, he said people from the Real World go in there all the time.We are. After that.Oh, well we're only gonna be there for an hour or so, you can just meet up with us after.I'll just text you when we're getting ready to leave. I hope you feel better. Lillian comes up already a little tipsy.Don't tell Perry I bought them,I ordered them from New York. They're insanely expensive. But I gotta tell you guys the compliments I get on my ass make them worth every penny. She sticks her butt out. Lillian slaps it and all the girls laugh. She is the life of the party.What?!!She's meeting us later!!!Annie HAS DIARRHEA!!She's fine! She's gonna meet us in an hour, it's all set! (to the other girls]Lillian, we're going to be late for our honey facials.I'm just saying, we're gonna be late. I don't wanna be rude.Excuse me Annie.You're not going to run into her. Just shut-up about it.Ew, he's like 65. Ok, look Lillian that's you.Ew, at that beach, that weird beach!She was crazy. Annie sinks. A flight attendant appears.Annie? Where are you? Inside a truck?Annie, the shower needs to happen soon. We haven't heard from you and everyone is-Annie can I dialog openly with you? I know you're having some financial trouble and I think it would be best if I did the shower. Now before you say anything, let me say that showers can be very expensive and I think what's important here is what's best for Lillian.You don't have to give me an answer nowGreat. Well, I'll definitely need some help.Could you bring the cookies? Annie hangs up, looks at her laundry piles. Pissed.Please join us for a Parisian Brunch at the home of Helen Harris III to celebrate the marriage of Lillian Donovan and Douglas Price. Let us âshowerâ Lillian with gifts and love. Date: Sunday the 20th. Time: 2:00 post meridian. Address and phone number below. Responde S'il Vous Plait. Yay! Annie picks up the phone, calls the R.S.V.P. number. Canon in D. plays. and a recorded message begins.Hello. This is Helen. You have reached the Responde S'il Vous Plait line for Lillian's shower.Please listen to all of the following menu options before making your selection. If you would like to reply âouiâ, press one. To reply ânoâ, press two. For where the bride and groom are registered, press three. If you require a vegetarian meal. Press 4. If you are vegan, press 5. A dairy free meal, press 6. Kosher meals will not be available. For the Lillian and Dougie story, narrated by me, please press 7. To hear a twenty-four hour wedding music mix, press 8, put your phone on speaker, light the Atmospheria candle you've just received and think about the eternal union that is marriage. I'm Helen Harris IV, and this is me saying au revoir! But before I do, here's a message from SUSAN SARANDON!Hi Annie!Oh, it's nothing....so...Just make yourself at home. Enjoy!What did you say?OK, not me, NOT ME! The GUESTS. Hip hop dance with the GUESTS!Hello ladies. Bonjour. Yay! Welcome. I am your host Helen, a bridesmaid in Lillian's wedding. I want you all to have a wonderful time. Eat, drink, please have some cookie! She laughs and then becomes very serious.Lillian. Today's your day. I'd like to make a beautiful toast, âYou are pretty, fun, sweet, look at all of your friends. Girlpower!â Everyone enjoy your lunch, served along with the musical stylings of...The LILLIANETTE'S!!! A quartet, all in pink and white and harmonize. âLillian, Lillian, Lillian, Lillian! When Lillian was a little girl...â Judy claps and enjoys the music. She leans over to Annie.#9. What is Lillian's favorite ice cream flavor? Write it down...quickly.OK, last one. For the big prize. #10. What is the craziest place Lillian and Dougie....? Helen strongly hints with a weird smile instead of saying, â...had sex?â Shower Girls Ooooh and Ahhhh.This one's from me. Helen hands Lillian her gift. Lil opens it and holds up beautiful lingerie.Why don't we go in the other room and--Annie. Everyone I am so sorry, I really don't know what you mean.Do you think she still has body lice?The park? Don't be stupid Dana.Well, it's closed is all I'm just saying.Why would she go to the reservoir? Its just a big tank of water.Is that supposed to be a dig on my driving?Oh, I'm sorry. I didn't take a stunt driving course in Renegade missions.I was being funny!Dana who's side are you on? All the girls start yelling. Helen loses control of the car for a split second and drives off the road hitting something. BOOM! The girls scream!!! She pulls over. All the girls are wide eyed and speechless.Was it a person?Everybody calm down. I'm calling 911.Probably?!Just don't scratch anything. The girls are all crouched down to watch Annie in awe.Are you guys working or talking? We do't have all night.Excuse me?! Dana stands. She has had it with Helen.What!?What are you talking about? The only reason you're even in this wedding is because you're the groom's sister. Weirdo.Why is everyone attacking me? I wasn't the one who caused a huge scene at Lillian's bridal shower and made her cry.Hey what about me? He turns around to be hit with a huge piece of wood by Helen. He falls.Annie get in!Her car's not here.Annie, Lillian loves you. (beat] I know I haven't made things easy for you.. I don't have a life and I am bored. Perry is always away and I'm constantly alone and she's been there. And I've been a bridesmaid nine times and although I may have implied it, I....I've never been a Maid of Honor. I wanted to make everything special for Lillian because... I don't have a lot of friends. I wanted her to like me better and to impress her, and everyone else. And I'm just good at throwing parties. I always have been. In fact sometimes I think people only ask me to be in their wedding's because of that.I'm sorry about the Sea World tickets.Oh, I didn't know that you did that.I deserved it.Well, I'm really rich. They smile.Really?!

RHODES.raw_line: Good afternoon ma'am, You in a hurry to get out of the city?Is that even possible in this rig? He finds this funny, Annie does't.You know funny thing about brake lights, you're supposed to have âem.Yeah, and you're headin' up Witches Curve. That's a risky move.Whoa, whoa, whoa, easy hot-dogger. That is not something you wanna go broadcasting to a police officer. I might feel obligated to give you a yea's worth of tickets now.You just admitted it.You admitted it. Yeah, I can't do that though.Oh, yeah. My little sister was just in a wedding. She lost some of her hair from the stress. Again, not funny.Uh, yeah. That's what happens when you break the law. Um...license and registration.Ooo, I like that air freshener. Did you get that at the gas station?Smells like Christmas. Yeah, it smells like Christmas. He rips the ticket off.Well, here you go. And just so you know it's a just a fix-it ticket. So if you get those lights repaired, you wo't have to pay anything.Whoa, are those moon-pies?Oh, those are my favorite.Nothing. Those are my favorite.No. It's too much trouble, they look all wrapped up. She doesn't get the hint. He really wants one.Well, have fun at your party. Annie drives off. He watches.Well, look who it is.I see your still driving around with busted tail lights.Nah... The reason I pulled you over today, is that-- you were driving too slow. Backing up traffic.Yep. You were going ten miles under the speed limit. That's a moving violation. It's...underdriving. It's in the books. But, I'm just going to give you a warning this time, but I do have to um...write some stuff down on a piece of paper. He begins to write. Beat.Man I'm hungry. I'm doing the Master Cleanse. You ever heard of it?Cayenne pepper water for three days now. It's supposed to clean you out, make you feel lighter. It's working. The only problem is I get so hungry. I just want a big slab of ribs. You ever crave that kind of stuff?No, it's OK, I've got three sisters. We had tampons in the pencil drawer. Sometimes my friends and I would say they were cigars and smoke'em. Okay. I have finished writing down the things I need to write, on this paper. OH! He hands her a business card.This is a buddy of mine. Owns a body shop in Milwaukee. Might be able to help you out for a good price with those taillights. I'll write my name on here so you can tell him who referred you.That's my name right there. In case you forgot it from last time. It's Nathan Rhodes.Annie Walker. I thought I heard your car out there.Jones? Oh boy. Guess somebody thought he was a little more memorable than he was.That's ok. Call me Rhodes. Trying to get âcalmâ?Oh.Yeah, trying to wean myself back to the really bad foods I like eating.A lot of people get up to high speeds on this road. I tell people its better to pay for a ticket than have your family pay for a funeral.Oh, you got the ugly carrot.There's one in every bag. You should eat it.Don't litter. He picks it up.Yeah, I don't go on blind dates. It seems unnatural.Just tell her the truth.You know my dad used to say that life is like a hallway of doors. You can stand at the same door forever if you want. Or you can open a different door. And that one may not be the right door, but i'll open up a whole new hallway of doors. Anyway, it worked for me. I was kinda lost and I opened a door and the next thing I knew I was a cop. And I love my job.Or you can always sell moon-pies by the side of the road.It's a joke. You had moon-pies in your car the first time I pulled you over.Oh, before you go. There is something I want to give you. I was gonna wait but, I think you'll want this now. He jokingly gives her the ugly carrot.Yeah. Don't forget about those taillights. They're really starting to bug me.Oh, I know what's going on. You're jealous of that Helen girl.If you say so.Oh come on, you know you got it goin' on...You're right, you don't.Sorry! Now Annie is back in her running car.Actually, I'm heading home. Got my sister staying with me for a few days. Sh's been thinking of divorcing of her husband.He had an affair and they've got kids so it's complicated.My sister is a hell of a woman, you know? And her husband is- you know what I think cheating is? It's weak. It's a weak person that cheats. Something clicks with Annie, she sees him in a new light.Yeah. I should go..now. Don't forget to call my friend about those tail lights. They're really starting to bug me.You too. He abruptly walks back to his car. She drives away confused.Well, I can't say I'm surprised.You should've taken it to my friend-Whoa. Don't take it out on me. This is your fault.You had no taillights! You did't get them fixed! You don't get to blame anyoe else. It's your fault. Annie starts to walk away.Where you going?! Annie keeps walking.Oh, you're going to walk fifteen miles?! Another WISE decision!I know that you not taking responsibility is why we're standing out here! YOU did not make an effort to fix that problem. This hits Annie. Rhodes is physically worked up.It's dangerous! You're putting your life, and others in danger!Look, all I know, is that you're kinda crazy. You're always stressed out or late, complaining about something, and now you're yelling at me! And for some reason, all I've ever wanted to do is ask you on a date.Yeah, I'm not much of a hickey guy anyway. Annie remembers her hickey. He saw it?!Well, then you have yourself a good night ma'am. Annie regrets that. He drives away leaving her there. She is alone.Yeah. Rhodes and I worked out a deal way back when, so, this one's on the house.Need a ride ma'am? It's Rhodes, leaning against his car like Jake in sixteen candles. Annie is all smiles and walks up to him.It was really complicated. I remembered the name of this place, I called them up, told them I was a cop calling on official police business, doing a very big investigation and uh, made them tell me all the weddings they had planned for the next two months with a bride named Lillian. [ALT: I'm a cop] Annie smiles.Yes I did.Yeah. No. I couldn't eat them. They were completely covered in ants.You probably should have put it in a plastic wrap or maybe a foil or something. Tupperware would've worked but then I'd have to get it back to you-I'm gonna kiss you right now so... He walks to her and takes her in his arms. They are about to kiss. Rhodes stops.I didn't want to miss my chance again.Need a ride ma'am? She turns to see Rhodes driving slowly next to her.I'm a cop. They're looking at each other, not knowing what to do.Yes I did.Yeah. No. I couldn't eat them. They were completely covered in ants.The real reason I came here today is that I have something that belongs to you. He opens his hand to reveal the ugly carrot. She smiles. He stops the car and unlocks the passenger door. She gets

MEGAN.raw_line: Annie! Hey! What's up?I just got pins in my leg! I fell off a cruise ship.Yeah. I was on a singles cruise.
